  • org.janusgraph.core.schema中JanusGraphManagement.IndexJobFuture的使用

    返回JanusGraphManagement.IndexJobFuture的org.janusgraph.core.schema中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    JanusGraphManagement.IndexJobFuture JanusGraphManagement.getIndexJobStatus​(Index index)
    If an index update job was triggered through JanusGraphManagement.updateIndex(Index, SchemaAction) with schema actions SchemaAction.REINDEX or SchemaAction.REMOVE_INDEX then this method can be used to track the status of this asynchronous process.
    JanusGraphManagement.IndexJobFuture JanusGraphManagement.updateIndex​(Index index, SchemaAction updateAction)
    Updates the provided index according to the given SchemaAction
